CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 27 In chlorobenzene ( CB ) solution , PIDT - EHNT showed an absorption maximum at 599 nm and a slightly weaker peak at 433 nm ; when changing the branched 2ethylhexyl to linear hexyl side chain , the resulted polymer PIDT - DTNT showed a slightly bathochromic shift of two corresponding peaks to 608 and 439 nm , respectively , which may due to the reduced steric hindrance of the linear side chain.

Let's think step by step.

1. Chlorobenzene (CB)
2. PIDT-EHNT
3. 2ethylhexyl
4. polymer PIDT-DTNT
5. linear hexyl side chain

These are the "Material Name" entities in the given paragraph.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

1. Chlorobenzene (CB)
2. PIDT-EHNT
3. PIDT-DTNT
4. linear hexyl side chain

These are the Material Name entities in the given paragraph, after removing irrelevant ones.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| Chlorobenzene (CB) |
| PIDT-EHNT |
| PIDT-DTNT |
| linear hexyl side chain |

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 27 In chlorobenzene ( CB ) solution , PIDT - EHNT showed an absorption maximum at 599 nm and a slightly weaker peak at 433 nm ; when changing the branched 2ethylhexyl to linear hexyl side chain , the resulted polymer PIDT - DTNT showed a slightly bathochromic shift of two corresponding peaks to 608 and 439 nm , respectively , which may due to the reduced steric hindrance of the linear side chain.

Let's think step by step.

1. "an absorption maximum at 599 nm" - "599 nm" is a "Property Value" entity representing the wavelength of light absorbed by PIDT-EHNT in chlorobenzene solution.
2. "a slightly weaker peak at 433 nm" - "433 nm" is a "Property Value" entity representing the wavelength of light absorbed by PIDT-EHNT in chlorobenzene solution.
3. "the resulted polymer PIDT - DTNT showed a slightly bathochromic shift of two corresponding peaks to 608 and 439 nm" - "608 nm" and "439 nm" are "Property Value" entities representing the wavelengths of light absorbed by PIDT-DTNT in chlorobenzene solution.

Therefore, the "Property Value" entities in the paragraph are "599 nm", "433 nm", "608 nm", and "439 nm".
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

1. "599 nm" - represents the wavelength of light absorbed by PIDT-EHNT in chlorobenzene solution.
2. "433 nm" - represents the wavelength of light absorbed by PIDT-EHNT in chlorobenzene solution.
3. "608 nm" - represents the wavelength of light absorbed by PIDT-DTNT in chlorobenzene solution.
4. "439 nm" - represents the wavelength of light absorbed by PIDT-DTNT in chlorobenzene solution.

Therefore, the relevant "Property Value" entities in the paragraph are "599 nm", "433 nm", "608 nm", and "439 nm".
